mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT c1.user_id userId,a.username,c1.content content,c1.create_time createTime, c2.user_id toUserId,a1.username toUsername,c2.content toContent,c2.create_time toCreateTime FROM COMMENT c1,COMMENT c2,`tb_admin` a,`tb_admin` a1 WHERE c1.id=c2.P_id AND a.id=c1.user_id AND a1.id=c2.user_id AND c1.p_id IS NULL
